name: THE FLOOR IS BULLETS
description:
THE FLOOR IS BULLETS is a psx prototype style game. It was submitted to the Mix and Game jam. The game was made by a 11 year old. The two genres I mixed were FPS and Platformer. For more info go to about in the Game

CONTROLS:

  • R to reset
  • W to walk forward
  • A to walk left
  • S to walk back
  • BACKSPACE to escape
  • CLICK to shoot
